IssueSpecification.Name: Fedora Account System account
IssueSpecification.Description: Fedora Account System account as registered to the Fedora Project.

Attribute.Name: cla
Attribute.Description: True if the CLA was signed

Attribute.Name: claplusone
Attribute.Description: True if the user is CLA+1

Attribute.Name: environment
Attribute.Description: Either dev, stg or prod, indicating the environment
